languages.text: "Конечно!" {n}— Арджента взволнованно вздыхает.{/n} "Ты помнишь первые дни атаки, когда нам удалось захватить одного из командиров еретиков? Он горел так ярко, что, должно быть, видно было на всем поле боя! Но особенно ценно то, что он успел рассказать до казни".

traits.locale_text: "Конечно!" {n}— Арджента взволнованно вздыхает.{/n} "Ты помнишь первые дни атаки, когда нам удалось захватить одного из командиров еретиков? Он горел так ярко, что, должно быть, видно было на всем поле боя! Но особенно ценно то, что он успел рассказать до казни".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Of course!" {n}Argenta heaves an agitated sigh.{/n} "Do you remember the first days of the attack, when we captured one of the heretic commanders? He burned so brightly, you could have seen him from anywhere on the battlefield, I'm sure! But what is most important is what he told us before his execution."
languages.original_text: "Конечно!" {n}— Арджента взволнованно вздыхает.{/n} "Ты помнишь первые дни атаки, когда нам удалось захватить одного из командиров еретиков? Он горел так ярко, что, должно быть, видно было на всем поле боя! Но особенно ценно то, что он успел рассказать до казни".

He burned so brightly, you could have seen him from anywhere on the battlefield, I'm sure! But what is most important is what he told us before his execution."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

He burned so brightly, you could have seen him from anywhere on the battlefield, I'm sure! But what is most important is what he told us before his execution."

He burned so brightly, you could have seen him from anywhere on the battlefield, I'm sure! But what is most important is what he told us before his execution."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Of course!" {n}Argenta heaves an agitated sigh.{/n} "Do you remember the first days of the attack, when we captured one of the heretic commanders? He burned so brightly, you could have seen him from anywhere on the battlefield, I'm sure! But what is most important is what he told us before his execution."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Por supuesto!». {n}Argenta resopla, embargada por el entusiasmo.{/n} «¿Recuerda los primeros días del ataque, cuando capturamos a uno de los comandantes herejes? ¡Ardió con tal intensidad que su llama sin duda se veía desde cualquier rincón del campo de batalla! Pero lo más importante es lo que confesó antes de ser ejecutado».
languages.original_text: "Of course!" {n}Argenta heaves an agitated sigh.{/n} "Do you remember the first days of the attack, when we captured one of the heretic commanders? He burned so brightly, you could have seen him from anywhere on the battlefield, I'm sure! But what is most important is what he told us before his execution."

traits.locale_text: «¡Por supuesto!». {n}Argenta resopla, embargada por el entusiasmo.{/n} «¿Recuerda los primeros días del ataque, cuando capturamos a uno de los comandantes herejes? ¡Ardió con tal intensidad que su llama sin duda se veía desde cualquier rincón del campo de batalla! Pero lo más importante es lo que confesó antes de ser ejecutado».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「もちろんだ！」{n}アルジェンタは動揺したようにため息をついた。{/n}「襲撃の初日に、異端司令官のひとりを捕らえた時のことを覚えているか？ 奴は激しく燃えるあまり、戦場のどこにいても奴の姿を見えたはず！ しかし、それ以上に重要なのは、奴が処刑前に我々に話したことだ」
languages.original_text: "Of course!" {n}Argenta heaves an agitated sigh.{/n} "Do you remember the first days of the attack, when we captured one of the heretic commanders? He burned so brightly, you could have seen him from anywhere on the battlefield, I'm sure! But what is most important is what he told us before his execution."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんだ！」{n}アルジェンタは動揺したようにため息をついた。{/n}「襲撃の初日に、異端司令官のひとりを捕らえた時のことを覚えているか？ 奴は激しく燃えるあまり、戦場のどこにいても奴の姿を見えたはず！ しかし、それ以上に重要なのは、奴が処刑前に我々に話したことだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “没问题！”{n}阿洁塔发出了激动的叹息。{/n}“你还记得那场战斗的第一天吗？我们抓住了一个异端分子的指挥官？他身上的火焰是如此明亮，我敢肯定，你在战场上的任何角落都能看得到。但最重要的是，他在行刑前对我们说的话。”
languages.original_text: "Of course!" {n}Argenta heaves an agitated sigh.{/n} "Do you remember the first days of the attack, when we captured one of the heretic commanders? He burned so brightly, you could have seen him from anywhere on the battlefield, I'm sure! But what is most important is what he told us before his execution."

traits.locale_text: “没问题！”{n}阿洁塔发出了激动的叹息。{/n}“你还记得那场战斗的第一天吗？我们抓住了一个异端分子的指挥官？他身上的火焰是如此明亮，我敢肯定，你在战场上的任何角落都能看得到。但最重要的是，他在行刑前对我们说的话。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Bien sûr ! {n}répond Argenta en poussant un soupir agité.{/n} Vous souvenez-vous des premiers jours de l'attaque, quand nous avons capturé l'un des commandants hérétiques ? Il a brûlé si vivement qu'on devait le voir de tout le champ de bataille ! Mais le plus important reste ce qu'il nous a dit avant son exécution. »
languages.original_text: "Of course!" {n}Argenta heaves an agitated sigh.{/n} "Do you remember the first days of the attack, when we captured one of the heretic commanders? He burned so brightly, you could have seen him from anywhere on the battlefield, I'm sure! But what is most important is what he told us before his execution."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr ! {n}répond Argenta en poussant un soupir agité.{/n} Vous souvenez-vous des premiers jours de l'attaque, quand nous avons capturé l'un des commandants hérétiques ? Il a brûlé si vivement qu'on devait le voir de tout le champ de bataille ! Mais le plus important reste ce qu'il nous a dit avant son exécution. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Natürlich!" {n}Argenta seufzt aufgebracht.{/n} "Erinnert Ihr Euch an die ersten Tage des Angriffs, als wir einen der Kommandanten der Ketzer gefangen genommen haben? Er brannte so hell, dass man von überall auf dem Schlachtfeld aus hätte sehen können! Am wichtigsten aber ist, was er uns vor seiner Hinrichtung gesagt hat."
languages.original_text: "Of course!" {n}Argenta heaves an agitated sigh.{/n} "Do you remember the first days of the attack, when we captured one of the heretic commanders? He burned so brightly, you could have seen him from anywhere on the battlefield, I'm sure! But what is most important is what he told us before his execution."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich!" {n}Argenta seufzt aufgebracht.{/n} "Erinnert Ihr Euch an die ersten Tage des Angriffs, als wir einen der Kommandanten der Ketzer gefangen genommen haben? Er brannte so hell, dass man von überall auf dem Schlachtfeld aus hätte sehen können! Am wichtigsten aber ist, was er uns vor seiner Hinrichtung gesagt hat."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Of course!" {n}Argenta heaves an agitated sigh.{/n} "Do you remember the first days of the attack, when we captured one of the heretic commanders? He burned so brightly, you could have seen him from anywhere on the battlefield, I'm sure! But what is most important is what he told us before his execution."

languages.text: "Tabii!" {n}Argenta huzursuzca iç çekiyor.{/n} "Taarruzun ilk günlerini hatırlıyor musun? Kâfir komutanlardan birini ele geçirmiştik. Yanarken nasıl da parlıyordu... Muharebe meydanındaki herkes görmüş olsa gerek! Fakat asıl önemli olan, infazından önce bize anlattıkları."
languages.original_text: "Of course!" {n}Argenta heaves an agitated sigh.{/n} "Do you remember the first days of the attack, when we captured one of the heretic commanders? He burned so brightly, you could have seen him from anywhere on the battlefield, I'm sure! But what is most important is what he told us before his execution."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii!" {n}Argenta huzursuzca iç çekiyor.{/n} "Taarruzun ilk günlerini hatırlıyor musun? Kâfir komutanlardan birini ele geçirmiştik. Yanarken nasıl da parlıyordu... Muharebe meydanındaki herkes görmüştür, şüphesiz! Fakat asıl önemli olan, infazından önce bize anlattıkları."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
